text: "Even When I'm Sleeping" is a 1997 song by Australian pop band Leonardo's Bride. It is the second single from their debut studio album Angel Blood. It went to number 4 in Australia and number 34 in New Zealand and won an ARIA Award in 1998. It was covered by John Farnham in 2005 for his album I Remember When I Was Young. ==Track listing== Australian CD single # "Even When I'm Sleeping" (Dean Manning) – 3:55 # "Break" (Patrick Wong) – 3:21 # "Stay" (Three Cheese Mix) – 3:27 ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:John Farnham songs Category:Pop songs
title: Even When I'm Sleeping
